captions.text: One of the most exhausting things I've ever done!
My legs exploded but it was awesome!
Red Bull 400, the third edition to the "Storm the Kulm." With over 630 participants we've been fully booked for months.
I'm a bit nervous, I've never ran something this steep. At the beginning you have power but that disappears quickly. You have to fight for your goals!
"You're a cross country skier usually?" Yes, a cross country skier only actually, I just do this for fun here at the Kulm.
I'm completely destroyed but it was worth it!
The last 100 meters you feel like you're dying.
It was cool, exhausting but cool!
"5:04 sec you'd rank in the mens race around 5th place!" -- It's really a surprise, I did not expect this time at all!

title: Mountain running race up a ski jump - Red Bull 400 Kulm 2013
